headline: Goldman Sachs and T. Rowe Price to Launch Alternative Investments for Wealthy Clients by Year-End — What This Shift Means
summary: Goldman Sachs and T. Rowe Price are reportedly collaborating to offer alternative investments to wealthy clients by the end of 2025. But while greater access to specialized assets may deliver higher returns and improve diversification, the trade-offs for investors can include less transparency, higher risks, illiquidity and fees. headline: CEO Solomon Says AI Will Create Jobs At Goldman: 'We'll Wind Up With More Jobs 10 Years From Now Than We Have Today'
summary: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. (NYSE:GS) CEO David Solomon says advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) will result in an expansion of the bank’s workforce over the next ten years. Solomon shared his vision for the future of Goldman Sachs in a discussion with Bloomberg last week. Contrary to the common belief that AI might lead to job cuts, Solomon anticipates that AI will actually increase the firm’s employee count.
